DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether patient locally advanced pancreatic cancer receive dasatinib add standard care ( gemcitabine ) live longer , compare patient receive standard care ( gemcitabine ) plus placebo ; i.e . gemcitabine alone .
DOC.brief_title: Dasatinib Added Gemcitabine Subjects With Locally-advanced Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologic cytologic documentation unresectable adenocarcinoma pancreas . Recovery toxicity previous procedure establish diagnosis . ECOG PS 0 1 . Adequate organ function . Evidence metastatic disease . Previous radiotherapy chemoradiotherapy . History current pleural effusion . History significant cardiovascular disease . Clinically significant bleed disorder coagulopathy . Concomitant medication strong CYP 3A4 inhibitor .
